### Available Datasets 

**TCGA GBM** 
  + [TCGA](https://tcga-data.nci.nih.gov/tcga/tcgaCancerDetails.jsp?diseaseType=GBM&diseaseName=Glioblastoma%20multiforme) ^1

**Rembrandt**
  + [caArray](https://array.nci.nih.gov/caarray/project/fine-00037)
  + [Repository for Molecular Brain Neoplasia Data](https://caintegrator.nci.nih.gov/rembrandt/) ^2

**Gravendeel**
  + [GSE16011](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE16011) ^3

**Phillips**
  + [GSE4271](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE4271) ^4

**Freije**
  + [GSE4412](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE4412) ^5
  
**Murat**
  + [GSE7696](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE7696) ^6

References:  
1 [The Cancer Genome Atlas Research Network 2008](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18772890)  
2 [Madhavan S et al. 2009](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19208739)  
3 [Gravendeel LA et al. 2009](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19920198)  
4 [Phillips HS et al. 2006](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/16530701)  
5 [Freije WA et al. 2004](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15374961)  
6 [Murat A et al. 2008](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18565887)
